name: Tarzan Jungle Simulator 3D - Animal Forest Hunting
name_original: Tarzan Jungle Simulator 3D - Animal Forest Hunting
description:
Jaleel's father is lost in the jungle, they lived in a village nearby, poor Jaleel decided to find his father and bring him home safely but he is trapped among the fierce and deadly animals.

Can you help Jaleel to hunt down all the animals and bring his father home safely?

You to be very keen in shooting the animals, because as soon you fire a single bullet the animals will make a pack and will start attacking you.

Game Features
- FPS shooting experience
- Find the animals on the radar and shoot them before they kill you
- Multiple animals to shoot and kill
- Amazing 3D forest and gameplay
